Manish Malhotra Hosted A Fabulous Diwali Party & The Pics Are Proof That It Was A Blockbuster!

Manish Malhotra Hosted A Fabulous Diwali Party & The Pics Are Proof That It Was A Blockbuster!

Diwali week has finally begun and Bollywood celebrities are in full party mood. It is officially the season of card parties and it kickstarted with Farah Khan's special lunch and a Diwali bash hosted by Fashion designer Manish Malhotra.

Attending the party were Manish's close friends including Karan Johar, Ekta Kapoor, Tahira Kashyap and actors Nushrat Bharucha, Shilpa Shetty, Pooja Hegde, Vaani Kapoor, Sophie Choudry and Salman Khan’s sister Arpita Khan Sharma.

Several inside pictures and videos are doing rounds on the internet proving that it was a block buster event.

Monday definitely didn't feel like Monday for stars who attended this fabulous party hosted by Manish Malhotra.

(Pictures: Instagram and Agencies)
